entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
